## Bio

I am a Geospatial Data Analyst who uses **Ecological Niche Modeling** concept and applications to understand and explain influence of global change on distribution of species. In that process, I largely rely on big data and open source programming platforms such as **`R`** for ease of extensibility and reproducibility of all analytical steps.
